mapper.select: select paper.paperId,paper.courseId,course.couName,paper.description,paper.totalScore,paper.user from paper,course where paper.courseId=course.courseId group by paper.paperId,paper.courseId,paper.description,paper.totalScore,paper.user

select paper.paperId,paper.courseId,course.couName,paper.description,paper.totalScore,paper.user from paper,course where paper.courseId=course.courseId and paper.paperId=#{paperid} group by paper.paperId,paper.courseId,paper.description,paper.totalScore,paper.user

select paper.paperId,paper.courseId,course.couName,paper.description,paper.totalScore,paper.user from paper,course where paper.courseId=course.courseId and paper.courseId=#{courseid} group by paper.paperId,paper.courseId,paper.description,paper.totalScore,paper.user

select paper.paperId,paper.courseId,course.couName,paper.description,paper.totalScore,paper.user from paper,course where paper.courseId=course.courseId and paper.user=#{user} group by paper.paperId,paper.courseId,paper.description,paper.totalScore,paper.user

select paper.paperId,paper.courseId,course.couName,paper.description,paper.totalScore,paper.user, questype.quesName as quesname,COUNT(ques_paper.quesType) as questypenum from paper,course,questype,ques_paper where paper.courseId=course.courseId and questype.quesType=ques_paper.quesType and ques_paper.paperId=paper.paperId and paper.paperId=#{paperid} group by paper.paperId,paper.courseId,paper.description,paper.totalScore,paper.user,quesname
